com.incoming.pvnsdk

Class PushVideoAdManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.incoming.pvnsdk.PushVideoAdManager

  • public abstract class PushVideoAdManager
extends Object
    Host applications that wish to deliver advertisements should use the advertising SDK of their choice to implement this adapter and register for to receives requests to play advertisements at PushVideo.configureAdManager(PushVideoAdManager).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PushVideoAdManager.AdCompletionCode

      PushVideoAdManager()

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean isAdvertismentReady()
      Checks if the advertising service has an advertisement ready to display.
      void onAdComplete(PushVideoAdManager.AdCompletionCode completionCode)
      Call when the advertisement has completed.
      abstract void playPreroll()
      Called by the Push Video SDK to request the advertising service to play an advertisement.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PushVideoAdManager

        public PushVideoAdManager()

    • Method Detail

      • playPreroll

        public abstract void playPreroll()
        Called by the Push Video SDK to request the advertising service to play an advertisement. The implementation of this method should call onAdComplete(AdCompletionCode) once the advertisement has played.

      • isAdvertismentReady

        public abstract boolean isAdvertismentReady()
        Checks if the advertising service has an advertisement ready to display. The Push Video SDK will not request an advertisement if this is false.
        Returns:
        true if the advertising service has an advertisement ready to display.

      • onAdComplete

        public void onAdComplete(PushVideoAdManager.AdCompletionCode completionCode)
        Call when the advertisement has completed.
        Parameters:
        completionCode - completion code
